nav.div: Madison District Public Schools » Our District » Coronavirus Updates » Distance Learning During School Closure

h4.span: Madison District Public Schools is committed to providing the best education possible to our students. In light of the current K-12 school closures across the state of Michigan, staff members throughout the district are working to ensure student needs are met during this extended closure period. Below you will find the most up-to-date information from the district regarding at-home learning opportunities, as well as information on available breakfast and lunch options. Please bookmark this page, as the the district will continually update this page with the most current information available.
